actions.committee: House Committee on Banking, Finance and Urban Affairs
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Banking, Finance and Urban Affairs.

committees.committee: House Banking, Finance, and Urban Affairs

official_title: A bill to amend the Equal Credit Opportunity Act to prohibit discrimination by card issuers against any applicant for a credit card on the basis of such applicant's occupation or the location of such applicant's residence.

summary.text: Amends the Equal Credit Opportunity Act to prohibit any credit card issuer from discriminating against any applicant on the basis of the applicant's place of residence or occupation.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Equal Credit Opportunity Act to prohibit discrimination by card issuers against any applicant for a credit card on the basis of such applicant's occupation or the location of such applicant's residence.
